mapper.sql: SELECT d.id, d.userId, u.nickName, d.content, createPlace, DATE_FORMAT(d.createTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createTime, d.dynamicType, d.longitude, d.latitude, d.power, t.realName, d.classLessonId, l.lessonName, l.courseId, e.courseName, d.organId FROM t_dynamic d INNER JOIN t_front_user u ON u.id = d.userId LEFT JOIN t_class_lesson l on l.id=d.classLessonId LEFT JOIN t_class_course e ON e.id=d.courseId LEFT JOIN t_student t on t.id=d.studentId
